name: Monster Energy Supercross 2 - The Nightmare Pack
detailed_description:
Buy the Monster Energy Supercross 2 - The Nightmare Pack now and expand the customisation options for your bike and rider!
It includes a set of 10 scary-themed liveries and special suits that will give you the chills! Aliens, skeletons and ghosts will give your livery an authentically spooky look!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500, AMD FX-8100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 with 2 GB VRAM or more / AMD Radeon HD 7950 with 2 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: *Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are not officially supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600, AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti with 4 GB VRAM or more | AMD Radeon R9 380 with 4 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: *Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are not officially supported.
